QuestData.Title: Warning Fairbreeze Village
QuestData.Description: Go to Fairbreeze Village and notify Ranger Degolien of the Amani plans. Even with Zul'Marosh dead, Fairbreeze must prepare for a troll attack. Tell Degolien I will send him reinforcements as soon as possible.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Fairbreeze Village in Eversong Woods and speak to Ranger Degolien.
QuestData.RewardText: The information you've brought is of vital importance, $N. Now that we know of the trolls' plans we can prepare for an attack.$B$BWe won't be caught with our guard down.
